entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make fixer for `CS0535` smarter when implementing `IEnumerable<T>` #67023
  • No completion for primary constructor parameters in Watch window in initializers #67021
  • `SyntaxGenerator`: cannot add an operator member declaration to an interface declaration #67019
  • Extract method refactoring is not offered in the base class argument #67017
  • Change signature refactoring doesn't update argument list in `class_base` #67016
  • Feature "Diagnostic analyzer runner" is currently unavailable due to an internal error (due to an assert) #67015
  • Move PreviewWorkspace diagnostic computation to OOP #67014
    17.6
  • Unexpected "IDE0060 Remove unused parameter" suggestion for a Primary Constructor parameter #67013
  • Formatting is not triggered after ending class declaration with a semicolon #67011
  • IDE0260 recommends switching to invalid pattern #67010

Closed

  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in ReplacePropertyWithMethodsCodeRefactoringProvider #41159
    Backlog
  • C#, Editor, 'Split string literals on enter' not honoring EOL convention. #41322
    Backlog
  • XML Doc Comment parser does not consider tuple syntax to be valid in crefs #22626
    Backlog
  • Incorrect `IDE0042` when tuple variable has usages #66994
  • Operators are classified as methods in tooltips #38783
    Backlog
  • Debug assertion failure in PerAnalyzerState.TryStartSyntaxAnalysis #65849
  • Assertion failure in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.AnalysisState.PerAnalyzerState.TryStartSyntaxAnalysis #65750
  • Crash in AnalzyerDriver. #66878
    17.6
  • Introduce StateKind.AttemptingToComplete for partial analysis state tracking #65330
    Backlog
  • Intellisense does not list members for 3th parameter in GroupJoin #38518
    Backlog
  • c# intellisense not autocompleting type names in VS 2019 #41234
    Backlog
  • Pattern matching - Local variable might not be initialized before accessing #41228
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix project system brokered service #67029
  • Minor source build fixes #67028
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove the PreviewWorkspace SolutionCrawler functionality #67027
  • Disable EnC for more Primary Constructors scenarios #67026
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Move code that uses Notification part of a code style option to analyzer #67022
  • Port Rename and Formatting tests to the new framework #67020
  • Make SimplifierOptions public #67012
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #67007
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Fix crash in 'replace property with methods' #67008
    Next
  • Respect user specified new-line character in split-string #67009
    Next
  • Remove callback functionality from symbol search #67024
    Next
  • Properly use 'ValueTuple' instead of native tuples in cref syntax. #66996
    Next
  • Add nullability info field into discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fix 'tuple can be deconstructed' issue with top level statements #66997
    Next
  • Fix SymbolDisplay to use 'Operator' kind when producing the display for an operator symbol #66880
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove CheckServerState #66998
    Next
  • Add feature to suggest make struct members `readonly` #66954
    Next

Updated

  • Filter source generator diagnostics by `SuppressMessageAttribute` #66965
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Check count before reusing cached items in `BatchNode` #66992
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Clean and rename FeatureOnOffOptions #66881
    Area-IDE
  • Improve the spans that 'add parameter check' is supported in #67004
  • Fix simplification in nameof expressions #67002
  • Rename options to editorconfig like name #66899
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid deep recursion while emitting deeply nested logical conditions #66993
    Area-Compilers
  • Update Telemetry Logger #66826
    Area-IDE
  • Results of running 'make member readonly' on IDE #66957
  • Fix signature help parameter selection #66988
  • Use extension keyword with modifiers #66919
    Area-Compilers
  • SymbolDisplay show modifiers for default interface implementations and static abstract members #66712
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • Local state tracing instrumentation #66768
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix completions in range expressions #66959
    Community
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
